attributes.action: Keep places of worship open as normal during the COVID-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: There is no evidence that the virus has been transmitted through churches and other places of worship. They have been following strict guidance and we should be allowed to worship freely and gather together as God’s people as the bible commands us to
attributes.background: Allow places of worship to continue to gather together in Covid-secure venues

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548621
